scripts.build: node scripts/switch-env.js production && npm run update && npm run cacheRefresh && npm run zip-git
scripts.build-cn: node scripts/switch-env.js production-cn && npm run update && npm run cacheRefresh && npm run zip-git
scripts.test: node scripts/switch-env.js test && npm run update && npm run cacheRefresh && npm run zip-git
scripts.test-new: node scripts/switch-env.js test-new && npm run update && npm run cacheRefresh && npm run zip-git
